title: South Africa
description:
Plunging deep into the ground, the gaping hole of an open-pit mine is unmistakable from space. People have excavated such pits on every continent except Antarctica.

The mine pictured here has been growing vertically and horizontally near Phalaborwa, South Africa, for more than 50 years.
theme:
MANKIND. Traces of human presence
